cu.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to a negative value (-1) will cause invalid cell identification and cell setup failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting pMax to an out-of-range value (100) will cause invalid maximum power configuration and transmission issues.
du.explanation_zh: 將 pMax 設定為超出範圍的值 (100)，會導致無效的最大功率配置，並造成傳輸問題。
